definition[0]: to become dark, or to make something dark
example[0]: The sky darkened and a few drops of rain fell.
example[2]: The evening shadows darkened the room.
definition[1]: to become less hopeful or positive, or to make something like this
example[3]: As he got drunker, his mood darkened.
definition[2]: if someone’s face darkens, they start to look angry
example[4]: The captain’s face darkened as he read.
